result.arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَدّٗا وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَدّٗا فَأَغۡشَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
result.translation: Imbere yabo n’inyuma yabo hose, Twebwe Allah Twarahakingiriye baraheza baba nk’uwugariwe inzira imbere n’inyuma yiwe, maze Duhumya n’amaso yabo, ntibashobora kubona n’inzira ibarongora ku kuri, kubera amanyama n’ubugarariji vyabo[3];
result.footnotes: [3] Ukudashobozwa kubona ukuri ngo ugukurikire, ni co gihano c’uwo wese agira amanyama mu kugarariza ukuri.
